original_title: Wolfgang Amadeus Mozart - Le nozze di Figaro - Salzburg Festival
overview: Mozart’s Le nozze di Figaro is an unforgettable opera about love, desire and the primal force of uncontrollable passion. Concluding the Salzburg Festival’s highly successful Mozart / Da Ponte cycle, director Sven-Eric Bechtolf sets this emotional tour de force in a stately English country house during the 1920s. The renowned Vienna Philharmonic ensures an exceptional evening of music from Mozart’s birthplace.
title: Wolfgang Amadeus Mozart - Le nozze di Figaro - Salzburg Festival
